description:
Funny World is a shooting gallery game originally released in the two-in-one pack Funny World & Balloon Boy.

The player controls a cannon at the bottom of the screen that can be tilted right or left, having to shoot cartoon animals that run across the screen. Occasionally a woman will walk across the screen; shooting her will cost a life. A limited use special attack can be used to hit any enemy on the screen.
title: Funny World

description:
Balloon Boy is an arcade shooting game originally released as the two-in-one pack Funny World & Balloon Boy.

The player controls a boy at the bottom of the screen, being able to move left and right, jump and shoot upwards. Rows of balloons move across the screen at the top and the goal is to pop them all by shooting them. Popped balloons might drop bonus items or enemies and hazards that need to be avoided.
title: Balloon Boy

description:
This is a stand-alone release of Super Turrican: Score Attack, previously released in Turrican Anthology Vol. II.

The player is tasked with completing a single, large level while aiming for a high score.
title: Super Turrican: Score Attack

description: This is a version of Yeah Yeah Beebiss II, reskinned to let you play as developer John Riggs himself. Bonus items have also been redesigned as collectible NES cartridges.
title: Yeah Yeah Beebiss II: Riggs Version
